version_description: Fixed the issue for some specific devices that had difficulty displaying contents in the album and Recents after updating to iOS 11. We deeply apologize for the inconvenience we have caused due to this issue.

Thank you for using Mitene!

- Bug fixes and performance improvements

We hope you can enjoy using Mitene with your family even more.

Thank you for using Mitene!

Thank you for using Mitene!

It's Easier Than Ever to Invite the Family!
- The number of albums you can join has been increased from 3 to 6.
- The number of family that can be invited to an album has been increased from 20 to 30.

We hope you can enjoy using Mitene with your family even more.

[Important Notice] Issues of Accepting Invitation from the Family Members

We have been encountering an issue of not being able to complete the invitation sent from Mitene in a certain circumstance.

Details of the Issue
When accessing from an invitation received on iPhone/iPad, error message will pop-up, then the app shuts down.

Workaround for the Issue
When receiving the invitation, create tentative album from "Make a New Album", then uninstall the app and reinstall again.
After the app is reinstalled, tap step 2 URL and this will complete the invitation process.

We have been fixing the issue but due to the holiday period for Apple/iTunes Store, our next update will be most likely after Dec. 28th.
We deeply apologize for any of the inconvenience we have caused.

Thank you for using Mitene!

- Issue of invitation process has been resolved. We've confirmed that the invitation process works properly with this version.

We hope you enjoy using Mitene with your family.

"DVD Feature" Launch!

DVD feature enables you to display videos to big TV screens and secure the precious data in hands.
- Enjoy videos on TV screens with the TV version.
- Secure all data e.g. photos, videos, and comments, in hands with the PC version.
- Special 1s Movie for TV version.

Access DVD feature from the "Memories" on the bottom of the screen along with photobook and 1s Movie.

We hope you enjoy using Mitene with your family.

Mitene's 1s Movie feature is getting an upgrade with the new version!

[Upcoming 1s Movie Upgrades]
Previously, only a maximum of 2 videos were distributed. After the upgrade, we will be delivering the original movies four times a year—seasonally and on a regular basis.
1. In addition to videos, photos will also be included.
2. A new 1s Movie will be created every three months.

[1s Movie Creation Requirement]
You'll need to upload more than 20 videos and/or photos within the three-month period.

[When Will a New 1s Movie Arrive?]
The distribution of new 1s Movies will start from late June 2018.

Distributed in late June: Memories dated from January - March 2018
Distributed in mid-July: Memories dated from April - June 2018
Distributed in mid-October: Memories dated from July - September
Hereafter, 1s Movies will be delivered every three months.

Enjoy a new movie every season!

Thank you for using Mitene!

- The app name displayed on the home screen has changed to “Mitene” from “Family Album Mitene”.

We hope you can enjoy using Mitene with your family even more.

We've made the following improvements on the album screen!

- Moving to a month on the upper part of the screen has become easier!
By sliding the months left and right, you can quickly go to the month you want to see.

- The album screen has improved for better viewing!
The year displayed at the top of the album is now hidden when scrolling down the album screen.

- Other useful function
If you want to return to "the latest month" from a previous month, just tap the Album button. Try it!

We aim to provide the service that will bring joy to raising children.

Mitene Photobooks can now be ordered and shipped to anywhere in the world!

Compact and brimming with memories, each Photobook is $7.49 and comes with free shipping during our current promotion.

Use our Monthly Photobook Suggestions, customize with a few changes, or create your very own from scratch.

Photobooks can be purchased via “Memories” on the bottom menu in the app.

Whether you want to give form to family memories or send a present to Grandma or Grandpa, Mitene Photobooks are there with you every step of the way.

Thank you for using Mitene!

We've released the following updates to improve your experience:
- Inviting family has become even easier! Simply have a family member scan your QR code to join the album.
- More family roles are available! You can now select "Uncle" and "Aunt" as roles when inviting family.

We hope you can enjoy using Mitene with your family even more.

Introducing FamilyAlbum Premium!

Think of Premium as more of what you love. Current features remain free and unlimited, and Premium users get access to additional features. The first month is free!

Once one album owner registers, all album members gain access to these special benefits:

PREMIUM FEATURES
1. Special 1s Movies Delivered Monthly!
1s Movies will be delivered to you every month so you and your family can relive the precious moments more often. Premium 1s Movies include photo collages and more!
*Don't worry, Premium users will still receive the classic 1s Movies every three months.

2. Upload from Your Computer
Upload photos and videos directly from your computer. With Premium, you can easily upload all of your memories.

3. Upload Videos Up to 10 Minutes
Some of the best moments last longer than 3 minutes. Upload longer memories and never miss a moment.

SUBSCRIPTION FEE
Get FamilyAlbum Premium for the entire family for only $4.99 a month. The first month is free!
*At this time, only album owners can register for Premium. To register, open the "Settings" tab and tap “FamilyAlbum Premium.”

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

NEW: More Sharing Options with FamilyAlbum Premium!

Now you can choose who gets to see each photo and video. Share memories with specific family members, or upload memories that only you can see. Save custom groups for easy sharing!

Other Great Premium Features:

1. Special 1s Movies Delivered Every Month!
Relive precious moments more often. Don't worry, Premium users still receive the classic 1s Movies every three months.

2. Upload from Your Computer
Add photos and videos directly from your computer. With Premium, you can easily upload all of your memories.

3. Upload Videos Up to 10 Minutes
Some of the best moments last longer than 3 minutes. Upload longer memories and never miss a moment.

Subscription Fee
FamilyAlbum Premium is only $4.99 USD a month for the whole family. The first month is free! Tap "FamilyAlbum Premium" in the Settings tab to get started.

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

It's now easier than ever to create and order FamilyAlbum photobooks! With this update, you can:

- Easily rearrange photos in your photobook by date
- Select whether or not to print comments for all photos
- Select whether or not to print date at the bottom of the page
- Cancel orders within 8 hours via "Order History"

To access the first 3 options, tap "Edit" in the top right of the photobook preview screen.

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

It’s now possible to upload photos and videos from any album or folder on your device. Just tap “All Photos & Videos” at the top of the Add screen to access them. Happy uploading!

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

Introducing our newest Premium feature: Pages!

Now you can look back at photos and videos automatically sorted by child. Plus, record each child’s growth by writing monthly journal entries and more.

Other Premium features include:
・More 1s Movies
・Free shipping
・Additional sharing options
・Upload longer videos
・Upload from your computer

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

Introducing a new invitation option: WeChat! Visit the Settings tab and tap “Invite Family” to invite family to your album via WeChat, WhatsApp, SMS (text), and more. Happy inviting!

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

Introducing new invite options!

・Write custom roles for family members. Great-Grandma, Cousin, Honorary Aunt… the possibilities are endless!
・Invite your child. Perfect for inviting older children who want to join their own album, write comments, and look back on memories from when they were younger.

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

We recently added a Premium feature called Personal Pages, but some Pages had incorrect names. Now, there's a way to correct them. To change the names on your children's Pages, follow the steps below:

1. Go to the Collections screen and tap a child’s Page.
2. Tap “?” in the top right.
3. Tap "Wrong Name? Tap Here!” and select the correct name.

If you have any questions, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

This update includes the following improvements:

- While you could always join multiple albums, your nickname would be the same in all of them. With this update, you can now have different nicknames in every album!
- FamilyAlbum is now available in British English! To switch between British and American English, just tap "Language" in the Settings tab.

Now photos and videos you’ve favorited in the app will show a little star icon on the Album screen. Perfect for checking that you’ve marked all your best shots!

To add a photo or video to your Favorites, just tap the star icon in the upper-right corner. If you’d like to check out all your favorites, tap the square icon in the upper left of the Album screen. Scroll down to Favorites and tap a thumbnail to view your collection.

FamilyAlbum is now available in German! To change the language of your app, just tap "Language" in the Settings tab. If you have relatives who are more comfortable using German, now is a great time to invite them to your album.

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

Introducing the FamilyAlbum widget!

Rediscover your favorite family moments and keep your loved ones on your Home Screen with this widget from FamilyAlbum.

A widget is an object for your Home Screen that displays useful and delightful content from an app. The FamilyAlbum widget displays photos from your most recently viewed album, rotating every 5 minutes.

To install, update to iOS 14, press and hold your Home Screen, then tap the + button in the upper-left corner.
*Only available on iPhone

This update includes the following improvements:

- Bug fixes and performance improvements

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

Introducing new photobook types!

- [NEW] Hardcover
Crafted to lie completely flat, this hardcover is perfect for the memories you want to treasure forever.

- [NEW] Premium Softcover
A softcover with a big impact. The laminate cover is fold resistant, and photos are printed on thick, semi-gloss paper using a high-quality printer.

- Classic Softcover
Our most affordable option, this photobook makes it easy to get your favorite moments in print.

To order, just visit the Store tab.

We fixed an issue where HDR videos taken with iPhone 12 would become completely light blue or green when uploaded to FamilyAlbum.

If you have any questions or are still experiencing issues after updating to the latest version, please contact us by tapping "Inquiries" in the Settings tab or via email at support@family-album.com.
Thank you very much for your patience and we apologize for the inconvenience.

This version resolves an issue where certain users were unable to successfully upload videos to the FamilyAlbum app.
If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us by tapping "Inquiries" in the Settings tab. You can also reach us via email at support@family-album.com.
Thank you very much for your patience and we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.

FamilyAlbum Original Prints and Photo Albums!

By popular demand: introducing FamilyAlbum prints! Print everyday moments, big milestones, and everything in between. These prints are perfect for decorating the refrigerator or building a special album that grows over time. With close attention to the tiniest detail, our high-quality prints and custom photo albums will beautifully preserve your family's special moments forever.

For more details or to order, visit the Store tab and tap "Prints".

New to the Store: matte prints! Now you can choose between glossy and matte paper when ordering photo prints from FamilyAlbum.

Whether matte or glossy, you get...
- Genuine high-quality Fujifilm prints
- 7 border colors to choose from
- Printed dates for easy organization and reminiscing

Ready to get started? Be sure to check out our Starter Kits! Each kit includes 12 prints and one custom album with a beautiful, long-lasting photo cover. Albums hold up to 120 prints (or 300 with additional pages)!

New print sizes added! Check out Square and Rectangle Prints now available in the Store tab.

New Print Sizes:
Square: 3.5 x 3.5 inches (8.9 x 8.9 cm)
Rectangle: 3.5 x 5 inches (8.9 x 12.7 cm)

We've also added Additional Pocket Pages (expand your album to hold up to 300 Retro/Square Prints or up to 200 Rectangle Prints!) and custom photo albums for individual purchase.

To order or learn more, visit the Store tab and tap "Prints".

Because every family is different, we've added more flexibility to our album settings! With this update, parents can now enable or disable commenting in their album. To take advantage of this new feature, just head to the Settings tab.

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements, and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

This update includes the following improvements:

1. Parents can now disable the Visits history for their album from the Settings tab

2. Landscape viewing for photos (this was already available for videos)

3. You can now select from your Favorites when ordering prints. To order, just visit the Store tab and tap “Prints"

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements, and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

This update includes the following:

- You can now order multiples of photo prints. Easily add extra copies of prints you love or want to share with family.

Prints are the perfect way to save your child's growth. You can order photo prints by going to the Store tab and tapping "Create" under Prints.

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements, and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!

- Introducing photo print suggestions
Starting April, enjoy photo print suggestions alongside your monthly photobook designs.

- The FamilyAlbum widget
The FamilyAlbum widget shows off precious moments right on your iPhone's home screen.

To learn more about the widget, update the app, go to the Settings tab, and tap "FamilyAlbum Widget".

If you have any questions or feedback, please contact us at support@family-album.com. Stay tuned for more improvements, and thank you for using FamilyAlbum!
